member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.MultimediaStreaming.MsError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: T:DirectShow4Net.BDA.RunningStatus
member.summary: Define possible values for a running_status field according to ETSI EN 300 468 This enum doesn't exist in the c++ headers

member.name: T:DirectShow4Net.AMMediaType
member.summary: From AM_MEDIA_TYPE - When you are done with an instance of this class, it should be released with FreeAMMediaType() to avoid leaking

member.summary: Returned object must be released with DsUtils.FreeAMMediaType()

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DES.DESError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsCAUUID.ToGuidArray
member.summary: Perform a manual marshaling of pElems to retrieve an array of System.Guid. Assume this structure has been already filled by the ISpecifyPropertyPages.GetPages() method.
member.returns: A managed representation of pElems (cElems items)

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DirectShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsError.GetErrorText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string describing a DS error. Works for both error codes (values 《 0) and Status codes (values 》= 0)
member.param: HRESULT for which to get description
member.returns: The string, or null if no error text can be found

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsUtils.GetPinCategory(DirectShow4Net.IPin)
member.summary: Returns the PinCategory of the specified pin. Usually a member of PinCategory. Not all pins have a category.
member.returns: Guid indicating pin category or Guid.Empty on no category. Usually a member of PinCategory

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsUtils.FreeAMMediaType(DirectShow4Net.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Free the nested structures and release any COM objects within an AMMediaType struct.

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsUtils.FreePinInfo(DirectShow4Net.PinInfo)
member.summary: Free the nested interfaces within a PinInfo struct.

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsFindPin.ByDirection(DirectShow4Net.IBaseFilter,DirectShow4Net.PinDirection,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scans a filter's pins looking for a pin in the specified direction
member.param: Zero based index (ie 2 will return the third pin in the specified direction)
member.returns: The matching pin, or null if not found

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsFindPin.ByName(DirectShow4Net.IBaseFilter,System.String)
member.summary: Scans a filter's pins looking for a pin with the specified name
member.returns: The matching pin, or null if not found

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsFindPin.ByCategory(DirectShow4Net.IBaseFilter,System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scan's a filter's pins looking for a pin with the specified category
member.param: The guid from PinCategory to scan for
Zero based index (ie 2 will return the third pin of the specified category)
member.returns: The matching pin, or null if not found

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsFindPin.ByConnectionStatus(DirectShow4Net.IBaseFilter,DirectShow4Net.PinConnectedStatus,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scans a filter's pins looking for a pin with the specified connection status
member.param: Zero based index (ie 2 will return the third pin with the specified status)
member.returns: The matching pin, or null if not found

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsToString.AMMediaTypeToString(DirectShow4Net.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Produces a usable string that describes the MediaType object
member.returns: Concatenation of MajorType + SubType + FormatType + Fixed + Temporal + SampleSize.ToString

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsToString.MediaTypeToString(System.Guid)
member.summary: Converts AMMediaType.MajorType Guid to a readable string
member.returns: MajorType Guid as a readable string or Guid if unrecognized

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsToString.MediaSubTypeToString(System.Guid)
member.summary: Converts the AMMediaType.SubType Guid to a readable string
member.returns: SubType Guid as a readable string or Guid if unrecognized

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsToString.MediaFormatTypeToString(System.Guid)
member.summary: Converts the AMMediaType.FormatType Guid to a readable string
member.returns: FormatType Guid as a readable string or Guid if unrecognized

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DsToString.WalkClass(System.Type,System.Guid)
member.summary: Use reflection to walk a class looking for a property containing a specified guid
member.returns: String representing property name that matches, or Guid.ToString() for no match

member.name: M:DirectShow4Net.DMO.DMOError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DMO or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic COM error is thrown.
